description: A setup error message appears during Windows deployment, indicating potential issues with the installation process. This symptom can hinder smooth upgrades from Windows 10 to Windows 11, especially when using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS). The appearance of the setup error message suggests that user interventions or more debugging might be required to resolve the deployment issues. Administrators should utilize tools such as SetupDiag to gain insights into the error and streamline the deployment process. Troubleshooting this error message can enhance the overall deployment experience and reduce downtime for end users.
